thread.title: ‘Grandfather of CDOs’ Trying to Do For Higher Education What He Did for Mortgages

author: Lisa Beilfuss
title: ‘Grandfather of CDOs’ Trying to Do For Higher Education What He Did for Mortgages
text:
A decade after the financial crisis, The Wall Street Journal has checked in on dozens of the bankers, government officials, chief executives, hedge-fund managers and others who left a mark on that period to find out what they are doing now. Today, we spotlight former Merrill Lynch bankerChristopher Ricciardi and Moody’s CEORaymond McDaniel.
Christopher Ricciardi, a former Merrill Lynch banker, was known as the “grandfather of CDOs” for helping popularize these complex structured products that blew up during the financial...
